title: Lossy kernelization.
abstract: In this paper we propose a new framework for analyzing the performance of preprocessing algorithms. Our framework builds on the notion of kernelization from parameterized complexity. However, as opposed to the original notion of kernelization, our definitions com- bine well with approximation algorithms and heuristics.
